goals__remit:
-represent senior volunteer organisations vis-à-vis the European Institutions, while creating a commonality of intents for the senior volunteers' associations across the EU 
-an example of Volunteers in Action for the benefit of developing countries 
-to help eradicate poverty 
-to assist small and medium size enterprises in developing countries
